data.title: Grand Valley State University
data.meta_description: Providing legal counsel, training, and assistance to support University vision, mission, and values.
data.text:
Office of General Counsel Mission: To proactively support the University's vision, mission, values and strategic plan by providing legal counsel, training, and other assistance to institutional representatives.

Legal Counsel and Assistance: We provide legal counsel and assistance exclusively to Grand Valley State University representatives regarding University matters. All requests for legal services on behalf of the University must be directed to the Office of General Counsel. If you need personal legal advice or representation with regard to a personal matter, you may be able to obtain information or assistance from the resources listed in this link: Personal Legal Services.

Attorney-Client Privilege: Communications with the Office of General Counsel are protected by the privilege for attorney-client communications, and therefore are confidential, if they are made for the purpose of seeking legal advice and assistance on behalf of the University.
